doc.title: Extreme Body Parts
doc.plot: Extreme Body Parts is a fascinating and invaluable examination of how we live as humans. With its cutting edge graphics, stunning location footage and rare archival imagery, this is an innovative series that explores the significance of our extremities on every level. From lovers who grasp hands and lock eyes on a first meeting to a stroll in the park, we explore how these body parts work and what they mean to us. In a spirited mixture of science, drama and fun, Extreme Body Parts invades, uncovers and explains everything that you need to know about your body but were afraid to ask.
